title: Course structure for ECE
content:
Hello i am joining pes EC campus this year.
Can anyone share the course structures and list of electives of ECE .
Thank you

comments.body:
Course structure of ECE: [UG\_Updated\_Course](https://ec.pes.edu/syllabus/)

Elective list (2021-2025 batch) : [Electives V sem](https://drive.google.com/file/d/13oTjXOuusdwDCXBXRlOfIoWxO7Ccz7Aj/view?usp=sharing)
can you share the 1 st year syllabus also
[https://discord.gg/Xhur3vMR](https://discord.gg/Xhur3vMR) : Join this discord server please. You can find it there
I have joined but i cant find them there
